snippet: The M23 rebel group pulled hundreds of soldiers out of Goma, but many of the city’s residents said they feared the return of the government’s forces, who have a reputation for lawless behavior.
abstract: M23 rebel group pulls out hundreds of troops from Goma, Democratic Republic of Congo, but residents wonder whether government troops will treat them better than rebels.
lead_paragraph: The M23 rebel group pulled hundreds of soldiers out of Goma, but many of the city’s residents said they feared the return of the government’s forces, who have a reputation for lawless behavior.

headline.seo: Congo Rebels Pulling Out of Goma
headline.main: Rebels Pull Out of Strategic City in Congo
headline.print_headline: Rebels Exit City in Congo, Leaving Trail Of Concern
